alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 1:56PM CST until December 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Trego, Scott, Lane, Ness and Rush Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 PM Wednesday to noon CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight Wednesday night to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego
